samples.ui
Class Component

java.lang.Object
  samples.ui.Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuddyList, Button, ChatBox, Choice, Label, List, PageBreak, ScrollableComponent, ScrollView, SectionNavigator, Table, TableRow, TextField
public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements an abstract user interface class that provides basic functions to control layout (position, width, height), display (foreground/background color, font, shadows, border, painting), and control (event dispatching and focus control).

NW_ANCHOR

public static final int NW_ANCHOR
Standard layout anchor settings.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

background

protected int background
Color to use for background painting. If -1, background will not be drawn.

focusBackground

protected int focusBackground
Color to use for background painting when in focus. If -1, defaults to background.

foreground

protected int foreground
Color to use for foreground painting.

focusForeground

protected int focusForeground
Color to use for foreground painting when in focus.

setBackgroundImage

public void setBackgroundImage(javax.microedition.lcdui.Image[] bgImg)
Set the backgroung image array of this instance. The image at index 1 is used when the instance has focus, and the image index 0 is used when the object does not have focus.

Parameters:
bgImg - The backgroung image array of this instance.

keyPressed

public boolean keyPressed(int action,
                          int key)
Update the state of this instance in light of a key press action. The default Component implementation is for a passive component, that is, a component that does not handle any key events.

Parameters:
action - The type of action.
key - The key released.
Returns:
true if the instance handled the event, and false if the instance ignored the event.

keyReleased

public boolean keyReleased(int action,
                           int key)
Update the state of this instance in light of a key release action. The default Component implementation is for a passive component, that is, a component that does not handle any key events.

Parameters:
action - The type of action.
key - The key released.
Returns:
true if the instance handled the event, and false if the instance ignored the event.

paintLowBorder

protected void paintLowBorder(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g,
                              int xx,
                              int yy,
                              int ww,
                              int hh)
Paint the bottom and right edge borders, if any, for this instance.

Parameters:
g - The Graphics object to use for painting operations.
xx - The X coordinate of the lower left corner reference point.
yy - The Y coordinate of the lower left corner reference point.
ww - The width of the bottom edge.
hh - The height of the right edge.

paintText

protected void paintText(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g,
                         int color,
                         java.lang.String text,
                         int xx,
                         int yy,
                         boolean hcenter,
                         boolean vcenter)
Paint the provided text within this instance.

Parameters:
g - The Graphics object to use for painting operations.
text - The string to display.
xx - The X coordinate of the lower left corner reference point.
yy - The Y coordinate of the lower left corner reference point.
hcenter - Whether the text should be horizontally centered within the component.
vcenter - Whether the text should be vertically centered within the component.

                         boolean hcenter,
                         boolean vcenter)

text - The string to display.
xx - The X coordinate of the lower left corner reference point.
yy - The Y coordinate of the lower left corner reference point.
ww - The width of the bottom edge.
hh - The height of the right edge.
hcenter - Whether the text should be horizontally centered within the component.
vcenter - Whether the text should be vertically centered within the component.
